definitions.title: n. verb. 1. m.
definitions.body: wife's father (Ar. xa0tinun a circumciser, hence father-in-law, with ref. to circumcision performed on young men just before marriage; xatanun relation on wife's side; v. We:Prol. 1886, 355 Anm, 1; Skizzen iii, 154 Sta:ZAW 1886. 143 Aum. Nö:ZMG 1886, 187; otherwise Dl:Pr 91 Lag:BN 116)—cstr. [[חׂתֵן]] Ex 18:1 + 9t., [[חׂתֶנְךָ]] Ex 18:6, [[חׂתְנוֹ]] Ex 3:1+ 9 t.;—usu. of Moses’ wife's father Ex 3:1, Ex 4:18, Ex 18:1, Ex 18:2, Ex 18:5, Ex 18:6, Ex 18:7, Ex 18:8, Ex 18:12, Ex 18:12, Ex 18:14, Ex 18:15, Ex 18:17, Ex 18:24, Ex 18:27 (a11 E), Nu 10:29 (J), Ju Jdg 1:16, Jdg 4:11; of a Levite Ju Jdg 19:4, Jdg 19:7, Jdg 19:9.
